name: One Armchair
maker: Frames attributed to François-Honoré-Georges Jacob-Desmalter, Tapestries by Beauvais Manufactory
description: One Armchair; Frames attributed to François-Honoré-Georges Jacob-Desmalter (French, 1770 - 1841), Tapestries by Beauvais Manufactory (French, founded 1664); Paris, France; about 1810; Mahogany and beech; gilt-bronze mounts; silk and wool tapestry upholstery; 100.6 x 63.5 x 48.3 cm (39 5/8 x 25 x 19 in.); 67.DA.6.8; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: One Armchair
medium: Mahogany and beech; gilt-bronze mounts; silk and wool tapestry upholstery
